languages.text: "За мыслями цвета вороненой стали, за блеклым холодом сизых эмоций... В душе господина ван Калокса тлеет янтарный уголек — столь теплый и яркий, что хочется к нему прикоснуться". {n}Кассия завороженно смотрит вдаль, словно перед ней стоите не вы. Опомнившись, она опускает взгляд.{/n} "Печально, что господин дознаватель собственными руками топит его в бездонной синеве долга. Печально... Но я его понимаю".

traits.locale_text: "За мыслями цвета вороненой стали, за блеклым холодом сизых эмоций... В душе господина ван Калокса тлеет янтарный уголек — столь теплый и яркий, что хочется к нему прикоснуться". {n}Кассия завороженно смотрит вдаль, словно перед ней стоите не вы. Опомнившись, она опускает взгляд.{/n} "Печально, что господин дознаватель собственными руками топит его в бездонной синиве долга. Печально... Но я его понимаю".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Behind the cobalt steel of his thoughts, behind the cold, faded grey of his emotions... an ember the colour of amber glows in Master van Calox's soul, so bright and warm one is tempted to touch it." {n}Cassia looks into the distance, transfixed, as though it weren't you standing in front of her. Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."
languages.original_text: "За мыслями цвета вороненой стали, за блеклым холодом сизых эмоций... В душе господина ван Калокса тлеет янтарный уголек — столь теплый и яркий, что хочется к нему прикоснуться". {n}Кассия завороженно смотрит вдаль, словно перед ней стоите не вы. Опомнившись, она опускает взгляд.{/n} "Печально, что господин дознаватель собственными руками топит его в бездонной синеве долга. Печально... Но я его понимаю".

Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."

languages.text: “在他钴钢般的思想背后，在他冷漠的灰色背后……冯·卡洛克斯大师的灵魂闪烁着琥珀的颜色。它是如此明亮，如此温暖，让人情不自禁想去触碰。”{n}卡西娅凝视着远方，目不转睛，仿佛站在她面前人并不是你。随后，她猛然清醒过来，低下了头。{/n}“那位审讯官打算亲手将自己的灵魂淹没在蓝色之中，将它溺死在象征责任的无底汪洋里。这真的很令人难过……但我能理解。”
languages.original_text: "Behind the cobalt steel of his thoughts, behind the cold, faded grey of his emotions... an ember the colour of amber glows in Master van Calox's soul, so bright and warm one is tempted to touch it." {n}Cassia looks into the distance, transfixed, as though it weren't you standing in front of her. Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Behind the cobalt steel of his thoughts, behind the cold, faded grey of his emotions... an ember the colour of amber glows in Master van Calox's soul, so bright and warm one is tempted to touch it." {n}Cassia looks into the distance, transfixed, as though it weren't you standing in front of her. Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."

languages.text: «Tras el acerado cobalto de sus pensamientos y el gris olvidado de sus emociones... hay un ascua ambarina en el alma del maestro van Calox, tan brillante y cálida que dan ganas de tocarla». {n}Cassia mira a lo lejos, absorta, como si no estuvieras delante. Después sale de su ensoñación y baja la vista.{/n} «Es triste que el Interrogador quiera ahogar esa chispa con el azul sin fin del deber. Triste... pero lo entiendo».
languages.original_text: "Behind the cobalt steel of his thoughts, behind the cold, faded grey of his emotions... an ember the colour of amber glows in Master van Calox's soul, so bright and warm one is tempted to touch it." {n}Cassia looks into the distance, transfixed, as though it weren't you standing in front of her. Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."

traits.locale_text: «Tras el acerado cobalto de sus pensamientos y el gris olvidado de sus emociones... hay un ascua ambarina en el alma del maestro van Calox, tan brillante y cálida que dan ganas de tocarla». {n}Cassia mira a lo lejos, absorta, como si no estuvieras delante. Después sale de su ensoñación y baja la vista.{/n} «Es triste que el Interrogador quiera ahogar esa chispa con el azul sin fin del deber. Triste... pero lo entiendo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「彼の思考のコバルト鋼の裏側、彼の感情の冷たく色あせた灰色の裏側…マスター・ヴァン・カロックスの魂には琥珀色が輝いています。それが、明るく暖かく、思わず触れてみたくなるほどなのです」{n}カシアは、まるで目の前に立っているのがあなたでないかのように、遠くを見ていた。そして、ハッとしたように目を伏せた。{/n}「インテロゲイターが自分の手でそれを職務という底なしの青に沈めようとするのは悲しいことです。とても悲しいことですが…私にもその気持はわかります」
languages.original_text: "Behind the cobalt steel of his thoughts, behind the cold, faded grey of his emotions... an ember the colour of amber glows in Master van Calox's soul, so bright and warm one is tempted to touch it." {n}Cassia looks into the distance, transfixed, as though it weren't you standing in front of her. Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の思考のコバルト鋼の裏側、彼の感情の冷たく色あせた灰色の裏側…マスター・ヴァン・カロックスの魂には琥珀色が輝いています。それが、明るく暖かく、思わず触れてみたくなるほどなのです」{n}カシアは、まるで目の前に立っているのがあなたでないかのように、遠くを見ていた。そして、ハッとしたように目を伏せた。{/n}「インテロゲイターが自分の手でそれを職務という底なしの青に沈めようとするのは悲しいことです。とても悲しいことですが…私にもその気持はわかります」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hinter dem kobaltblauen Stahl seiner Gedanken, hinter dem kalten, verblassten Grau seiner Emotionen ... glüht in Meister Van Calox' Seele ein bernsteinfarbener Funke, so hell und warm, dass man versucht ist, ihn zu berühren." {n}Cassia blickt in die Ferne, wie gebannt, als würdest du gar nicht vor ihr stehen. Dann erwacht sie aus ihrer Trance und senkt den Blick.{/n} "Es ist traurig, dass der Interrogator es mit seinen eigenen Händen im bodenlosen Blau der Pflicht ertränken wollte. Wirklich traurig ... doch ich kann es nachvollziehen."
languages.original_text: "Behind the cobalt steel of his thoughts, behind the cold, faded grey of his emotions... an ember the colour of amber glows in Master van Calox's soul, so bright and warm one is tempted to touch it." {n}Cassia looks into the distance, transfixed, as though it weren't you standing in front of her. Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."

traits.locale_text: "Hinter dem kobaltblauen Stahl seiner Gedanken, hinter dem kalten, verblassten Grau seiner Emotionen ... glüht in Meister Van Calox' Seele ein bernsteinfarbener Funke, so hell und warm, dass man versucht ist, ihn zu berühren." {n}Cassia blickt in die Ferne, wie gebannt, als würdest du gar nicht vor ihr stehen. Dann erwacht sie aus ihrer Trance und senkt den Blick.{/n} "Es ist traurig, dass der Interrogator es mit seinen eigenen Händen im bodenlosen Blau der Pflicht ertränken wollte. Wirklich traurig ... doch ich kann es nachvollziehen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Derrière le cobalt de ses pensées, derrière le gris terni et froid de ses émotions... dans l'âme de maître van Calox brille une braise ambrée, si brillante et si chaleureuse que l'on ne peut pas s'empêcher de vouloir la toucher. » {n}Le regard de Cassia se perd au loin, comme si vous ne vous teniez pas juste devant elle. Après un certain temps, elle se ressaisit et baisse les yeux.{/n} « Il est triste que l'interrogateur cherche à la noyer de ses propres mains dans le bleu insondable du devoir. Triste... mais compréhensible. »
languages.original_text: "Behind the cobalt steel of his thoughts, behind the cold, faded grey of his emotions... an ember the colour of amber glows in Master van Calox's soul, so bright and warm one is tempted to touch it." {n}Cassia looks into the distance, transfixed, as though it weren't you standing in front of her. Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."

traits.locale_text: « Derrière le cobalt de ses pensées, derrière le gris terni et froid de ses émotions... dans l'âme de maître van Calox brille une braise ambrée, si brillante et si chaleureuse que l'on ne peut pas s'empêcher de vouloir la toucher. » {n}Le regard de Cassia se perd au loin, comme si vous ne vous teniez pas juste devant elle. Après un certain temps, elle se ressaisit et baisse les yeux.{/n} « Il est triste que l'interrogateur cherche à la noyer de ses propres mains dans le bleu insondable du devoir. Triste... mais compréhensible. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kobalt çeliği rengindeki düşüncelerinin ve soğuk, solgun gri duygularının ardında... Üstat van Calox'un ruhunda kehribardan bir köz parlıyor. Öyle parlak ve içten yanıyor ki insan, uzanıp dokunmaya heves ediyor." {n}Cassia, uzaklara dalıyor. Bakışları sanki önünde değilmişsin gibi seni delip geçiyor. Derken bir anda kendine gelip bakışlarını yere kenetliyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki Sorgucu, dipsiz mavi vazifesinde bu parıltıyı kendi elleriyle boğmaya niyet etmiş. İçim acısa da onu anlayabiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Behind the cobalt steel of his thoughts, behind the cold, faded grey of his emotions... an ember the colour of amber glows in Master van Calox's soul, so bright and warm one is tempted to touch it." {n}Cassia looks into the distance, transfixed, as though it weren't you standing in front of her. Then she snaps out of it and lowers her eyes.{/n} "It is sad that the Interrogator seeks to drown it with his own hands in the bottomless blue of duty. Sad indeed... but I can relate."

traits.locale_text: "Kobalt çeliği rengindeki düşüncelerinin ve soğuk, solgun gri rengindeki duygularının ardında... Üstat van Calox'un ruhunda kehribar renginde bir köz parlıyor. Öyle parlak ve içten yanıyor ki, insan uzanıp dokunmaya heves ediyor." {n}Cassia, yanında değilmişsin gibi gözlerini uzaklara dikiyor. Ardından da dalgınlığı geçiyor, bakışlarını yere kenetliyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki Sorgucu, dipsiz mavi rengindeki vazifesinde bu parıltıyı kendi elleriyle boğmaya niyet etmiş. İçim acısa da onu anlayabiliyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
